name: Penguin After All
description:
Play as Scarlett a robot in a penguin suit in a penguin world. 
After some time on the road, it's time to find the way back home again. 
Help Scarlett find her way home!

Use a gamepad or keyboard.
D-pad for direction.
The B-button gives Scarlett extra speed and height when jumping.
Start is used to pause the game.
Select is used together with pause to leave the stage.
(Corresponding keyboard keys used are the Arrow keys, P, S and Space bar)

olcPixelGameEngine - JavidX9
https://github.com/OneLoneCoder/olcPixelGameEngine
Port - DevChrome
https://github.com/DevChrome/Pixel-Engine
Music/SFX by Fiskifickorna
Art by furryNacho 
Dev by furryNacho  

Requires OpenAL32 for sound to work properly
